info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 20 at 11:08PM CDT until July 21 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS St Louis MO
info.description:
FFWLSX
The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Fayette County in south central Illinois...
* Until 215 AM CDT.
* At 1108 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 5 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 2 to 3 inches in 1 hour. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring.
FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for central Fayette County. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW!
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Law enforcement reported.
IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Vandalia, St. Elmo, Brownstown, Avena, Bingham and Bayle City.
This includes Interstate 70 in Illinois near exit 76.
info.instruction:
Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR CENTRAL FAYETTE COUNTY
NWS: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY this area til 2:15 AM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY is in effect for this area until 2:15 AM CDT. This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR CENTRAL FAYETTE COUNTY
SNM: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 2:15 AM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 2:15 AM CDT. Esta es una situacion extremadamente peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
